title: The After Show Talks About What’s Going on Behind the Scenes at PCA Tradeshow
itunes:title: The After Show Talks About What’s Going on Behind the Scenes at PCA Tradeshow
description:
This week The After Show talks about the intrigue around who’s going and not going to the PCA tradeshow. Are companies being pressure to attend or not attend the show?

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
